title: Will Permanent World Emotes work in the upcomming Emotesystem?
body: So after reading the description of the bundles im wondering: If i buy the budle will i get only the icon and only then equipped i can spam the emote and that even after the realese of the emotesystem?. Or will i get a E-Sportemote after the realese and i can do it in the wheel to spam it with "T"?

replies.body: As far as I've been told, those emotes *should* be converted into the new Emote system once it fully launches, and they should be permanent as well!
